block.name: CADU Deframer and Derandomizer
block.doc:
MetOp and other sat's telemetry Deframer and Derandomizer block - all in one. Accept only NRZ encoded input. Input bits may be also inverted.
Useful for deframing and derandomizing AHRPT telemetry from MetOp, AHRPT from Fengyun 3, LRIT from GOES...
Sync on 1ACFFC1D ASM marker.
Derandomisation polynom : h(x) = x8 +x7 +x8 +x3 +1
Sync check : True >> check for valid sync marker in every frame False >> don't check, stay in sync
Length of frame : frame length in octets (bytes), sync marker included!
In sync after : how many frames must be valid for going to SYNC state.
Out sync after : how many frames must be invalid for going to OUT OF SYNC state.
